interface_specification_complete.notes: Covers all function signatures (rebuildSessionCache, _buildSkillPathIndex, _collectSourceMtimes, getAgentSkillIndex), hook interface, CLI interface, cache file format, settings.json schema, external manifest schema. 410 lines.

all_modules_designed.notes: 14 modules/changes designed across 7 core files (2 new, 5 modified) plus trigger integration points. Implementation order specified. 1291 lines.

ui_wireframes.notes: No UI screens -- this is a CLI/hook infrastructure feature with no user-facing interfaces.

user_flows_documented.notes: Data flow summary in section 13 covers cache build flow (13.1) and cache consumption flow (13.2). Architecture overview contains mermaid sequence diagrams for all 3 major flows.

error_taxonomy_complete.notes: 7 error categories, 21 error codes covering cache build, hook execution, CLI, consumer fallback, trigger integration, and skill path index errors. Severity definitions and fail-open hierarchy documented.

validation_rules_defined.notes: 35 validation rules across 8 rule groups: rebuildSessionCache input/output, cache file format, settings.json registration, skill path index, getAgentSkillIndex output, external manifest source, hook behavior, CLI behavior.

designs_cover_all_requirements.notes: All 9 FRs (FR-001 through FR-009) and 10 NFRs mapped to specific design components via traceability matrix in module-design.md section 16. All 5 ADRs (ADR-0026 through ADR-0030) referenced and implemented.

interface_contracts_reviewed.notes: component-spec.md defines contracts with preconditions, postconditions, error handling, and behavioral equivalence guarantees for all public interfaces.

article_I_specification_primacy.notes: All designs implement architecture specifications exactly. ADRs 0026-0030 are referenced and implemented as specified.

article_IV_explicit_over_implicit.notes: All design decisions documented with rationale. No undocumented assumptions. Error handling explicitly specified for every component.

article_V_simplicity_first.notes: Single-file cache, simple read-and-output hook (25 lines), fail-open fallback pattern. No background processes, daemons, file watchers, or distributed state.

article_VII_artifact_traceability.notes: Every component traces to specific FRs and NFRs via traceability matrix (module-design.md section 16). Implementation dependency graph documented (section 15).

article_IX_quality_gate_integrity.notes: All required design artifacts exist: module-design.md (1291 lines), component-spec.md (410 lines), error-taxonomy.md (130 lines), validation-rules.json (350 lines).
